product_name: New Balance Minimus MR20v2 Road-Running Shoes - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The men's New Balance Minimus MR20v2 Road-Running Shoes feature a low-to-the-ground 4mm drop, an expanded Vibram(R) outsole and enhanced uppers for runners looking for a more complete fit. 4mm heel-to-toe drop encourages a natural midfoot or forefoot strike to promote forward momentum and reduce the impact of heel striking. Premium lightweight midsoles resist compression and are 24% lighter than standard foam. Vibram outsoles provide maximum surface contact and multi-directional traction. New Balance Minimus MR20v2 Road-Running Shoes are barefoot-friendly inside, so you don't need socks. Closeout.
short_description: The men's New Balance Minimus MR20v2 Road-Running Shoes feature a low-to-the-ground 4mm drop, an expanded Vibram(R) outsole and enhanced uppers for runners looking for a more complete fit.
